message.body: Heyazz, about bringing that last minute flava in your ear: tomorrow night picnic on schykill w me, done with the barnes by 10 30 come have a bday drink with me and feel free to bring on the libations and chill on the river,if the sky gods concur
Yssss! Happy bday, hope we can make it!
We are headed to dock near strawberry mansion bridge
Its near the row house dock closer to east falls bridge
Its called st joes prep row center
:) ...just might take us a bit to get there
Hi Jeremy! I had a lovely bday evening ,thanks for always bringing that pura vida! You're just amazingly sincere and beyond wonderful people,friends,thank you
It was an amazing evening! So glad we came. You should come over for dinner soon!
